meanings.definition: A type of submersible vessel used for deep-sea exploration.
meanings.sent1: Scientists used bathyscaphes to study creatures in the deep ocean.
meanings.sent2: The bathyscaphes dove into the dark depths of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaphes threw a party for the fish at the bottom of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a bathyscaphes exploring the mysteries of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaphes illuminated the hidden world beneath the waves.

meanings.sent1: We saw many bathyscaphes lined up for the deep-sea mission.
meanings.sent2: The fleet of bathyscaphes prepared to explore the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaphes held a race to see who could reach the bottom first.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, the bathyscaphes danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaphes glimmered like jewels in the dark sea.
